title: Meenammaa Song Lyrics Aasai
stanzas: <div>Meenammaa Song Lyrics Aasai

Meenammaa
adhi kaalaiyilum
andhi maalaiyilum
undhan niyaabagame

ammammaa
mudhal paarvaiyile
sonna vaarthai ellaam
oru kaaviyame

chinna chinna oodalgalum
chinna chinna modhalgalum
minnal pola
vandhu vandhu pogum

modhal vandhu oodal vandhu
mutti konda podhum ingu
kadhal mattum kaayam
indri vazhum

idhu madhangal Â natkal sella
niram maaridum pookkal alla
Meenammaa..

Oru chinna poo thiriyil
oli sindhum raathiriyil
indha meththaimel
ilam thaththai por
pudhu vithai kaattida vaa

oru jannal angirukku
thendral etti paarpadharku
adhai moodaamal
thazh podaamal
enai thottu theenduvadhaa

maaman kaaran thaane
maalai potta naane
moga theerave
thiruvaai thiruvaai thodalaam

Meenammaa...
mazhai unnai ninaikka
ingu enakkallavaa
kulir kaaichal varum

ammammaa
veyil unnai anaithaal
ingu enakallavaa
udal verthuvidum

Andru kadhal panniydhu
undhan kannam killiyadhu
adi ippodhum niram maaramal
indha nenjil nirkkiradhu

andru pattu selaigalum
nagai nattum paathiramum
unnai kaetene sandai pottene
adhu kannil nirkkiradhu

jaadhi malli poove
thanga vennilaave
aasai theerave pesalaam
mudhalnaal iravu.

Meenammaa
unai nesikkavum
anbil vaasikkavum
thendral kaathirukka

ammammaa
unnai kadhalithu
buthi bethalaithu
.. poothirukku

unnai thotta thendral vandhu
enna thottu ennennavo
sangathigal sollivittu poga

un manamum en manamum
ondrai ondru yetrukondu
oppanthathil kaiezhuthu poda

indru mogana paatteduthom
mulu moochudan kadhalithom
Meenammaa
adhi kaalaiyilum
andhi maalaiyilum
undhan niyaabagame
